results.title: Statin therapy protects against abdominal aortic aneurysms by inducing the accumulation of regulatory T cells in ApoE-/- mice.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy prevented the development of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAA@@@ induced by @GENE_AGT @GENE_11606 @@@Ang II@@@ in ApoE-/- @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, which might be partly due to the induction of Treg accumulation.

citations.NLM: Meng L, Lu Y, Wang X, Sui W, Ge X, Zhong M, Meng X, Zhang Y. Statin therapy protects against abdominal aortic aneurysms by inducing the accumulation of regulatory T cells in ApoE-/- mice. J Mol Med (Berl). 2022 Jul;100(7):1057-1070. PMID: 35704059

results.title: Simvastatin Attenuates Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Formation Favoured by Lack of Nrf2 Transcriptional Activity
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm@@@ Formation Favoured by Lack of @GENE_NFE2L2 @GENE_4780 @@@Nrf2@@@ Transcriptional Activity

results.title: Different Drugs Effect on Mesenchymal Stem Cells Isolated From Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAA@@@-MSCs were exposed to different doses of @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@ (5-10-25 muM), @CHEMICAL_Doxycycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004318 @@@doxycycline@@@ (10-25 muM), and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (10 muM) for 24 h.

results.title: Treatment with simvastatin inhibits the formation of abdominal aortic aneurysms in rabbits.
results.text_hl: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibits the formation of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@abdominal aortic aneurysms@@@ in @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates the activity of matrix metalloprotease-9 in aneurysmal aortic tissue.
results.text_hl: To investigate whether statins reduce the concentration of @GENE_MMP9 @GENE_4318 @@@MMP-9@@@ in the aortic wall, we randomised @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ undergoing elective open repair of an @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@abdominal aortic aneurysm@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAA@@@) to a pre-operative course of either @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or placebo.

citations.NLM: Evans J, Powell JT, Schwalbe E, Loftus IM, Thompson MM. Simvastatin attenuates the activity of matrix metalloprotease-9 in aneurysmal aortic tissue. Eur J Vasc Endovasc Surg. 2007 Sep;34(3):302-3. PMID: 17574455

results.title: Simvastatin suppresses experimental aortic aneurysm expansion.
results.text_hl: This suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibits @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAA@@@ formation by blocking the expression of certain proinflammatory genes.

results.title: Treatment with simvastatin suppresses the development of experimental abdominal aortic aneurysms in normal and hypercholesterolemic mice.

results.title: Lower levels of Caveolin-1 and higher levels of endothelial nitric oxide synthase are observed in abdominal aortic aneurysm patients treated with simvastatin.
results.text_hl: It is a 1:2 case-control study of non-statin (n=12) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (n=24) who underwent open @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm_Abdominal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017544 @@@AAA@@@ repair.
